webpage.para: If you have installed SUSE LINUX on Server or Desktop, you have seen YaST in action. Basically YaST provides Installation, Configuration and Administration. YaST which stands for Yet another Setup Tool guides you through the installation procedure and later during the system configuration. Once the system is configured and running, web-updater offers a unique system maintenance service.

YaST is a key difference between SUSE LINUX and other Linux offerings. YaST manages all of the system configuration data behind the scenes and yet allows the user the freedom of manual configuration and editing of the system data if they so desire.
